Title: Relates to establishing renters security insurance and the security deposit guarantee program
Summary: Establishes rental security insurance and the security deposit guarantee program to give tenants an option to pay any deposit or advance to rent or use residential real property or a dwelling unit.
LawCode: Add ยง238-b, RP L; add ยง14-a, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to establishing security deposit options for certain tenants; and to amend the public housing law, in relation to establishing the security deposit guarantee program
